UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user profile within the UCV Conecta application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

email.description: User's email address, validated to be @ucvvirtual.edu.pe.

profilePictureUrl.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

Appointment.title: Appointment
Appointment.description: Represents a scheduled appointment (virtual or in-person).

id.description: Unique identifier for the Appointment entity.

startDateTime.description: Date and time the appointment starts.

endDateTime.description: Date and time the appointment ends.

location.description: Location of the appointment (e.g., virtual meeting link or Los Olivos campus).

isVirtual.description: Indicates whether the appointment is virtual (true) or in-person (false).

Resource.title: Resource
Resource.description: Represents a resource, event, or study material in the library.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Resource entity.

url.description: URL or path to the resource.

uploadDateTime.description: Date and time the resource was uploaded.

ChatMessage.title: ChatMessage
ChatMessage.description: Represents a single chat message within the community chat.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ChatMessage entity.

userId.description: Reference to UserProfile. (Relationship: UserProfile 1:N ChatMessage). The user who sent the message.

userName.description: The display name of the user who sent the message.

userAvatar.description: URL of the profile picture of the user who sent the message.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of when the message was sent.
